title: Senior Backend Engineer
job_context:
Job Context
Future outlook of the company ( Our Success)
SetSchedule is the software punch behind the Nation`s most successful Realtors and Professionals. Our future is bright! We have grown tremendously in the last couple of years and we can`t wait for you to join our company and be a part of that growth. Whether it`s being ranked 184th on the America`s Best Startup by Forbes, Inc, or Best Company for Diversity and Culture by Comparably, this is just the start!
Positive Culture
We have the best and brightest employees which are the real strength behind our company. When we put our heads together we have the ability to offer clients something powerful, cutting-edge, and distinct on every level. Our company culture centers around that effort, but it`s also about ensuring that we enjoy making it happen. Work hard, play hard! That`s our motto. Whether you`re looking for a work life balance, or you want to drive your professional career, there`s a spot for you at SetSchedule. We understand the driving force behind any successful company are its people and we love ours!

job_context:
Job Context
Mercury IT International Limited is a USA-based software company, a sister concern of Veradigm (https://veradigm.com). As an Expert Software Engineer on the Mercury IT International Limited Systems Architecture team, you`ll work closely with Business and Technical Leaders from across the organization to rearchitect our solutions to take advantage of everything the cloud (Azure) has to offer. We`re looking for someone with experience migrating solutions from an on-prem environment to Azure (PaaS). This is a key position in a highly visible strategic initiative to pay down technical debt, modernize our systems and build a secure and robust technical framework to support the continued growth of our best-in-class healthcare solutions!

Experienced with the AWS platform, especially AWS cloud services like Simple Queue Service (SQS), Simple Storage Service (S3), Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2), Lambda, etc.

title: Senior Officer, IT
job_context:
Job Context
Surjer Hashi Network (SHN) is a not-for-profit company limited by guarantee. Its mission is to offer high quality, customer-oriented and affordable healthcare services for all Bangladeshis, while its vision is to grow into a sustainable enterprise. Although it primarily aims to serve the underprivileged, SHN is committed to improve the health and welfare of all groups irrespective of their income, gender and age. With a focus on mother and child healthcare, and family planning, SHN is gradually expanding into general health services. The Company complements government efforts in the areas of TB screening, EPI and Covid-19 vaccination efforts. To support SHN mission, we are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Sr. Developer/ Programmer with expertise in ASP .NET, C#, and SQL Server to join the HQ IT team as Senior Officer, IT.
The Senior Officer, IT will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining software applications using the C# programming language and the .NET framework. The incumbent is expected to be a team player, enthusiastic about learning, enjoy solving problems and coming up with software solutions for Clinic Management/ Hospital Management solutions. The Senior Officer, IT will report to the Head of IT.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
Core application development using modern technologies.
Write complex SQL queries, Store Procedures, Functions with knowledge on Indexing, Query Optimization and Database Performance Optimization for MS SQL Server & MySQL
Manage databases through multiple product lifecycle environments, from development to mission-critical production systems.
Analyze, solve, and correct issues independently in real time, providing end-to-end solution.
Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and document changes.
Configure and maintain database servers and processes, including monitoring of system health and performance to ensure high levels of performance, availability, and security.
Design Reports in Crystal Report, RDLC Report.
Web service administration & configurations
Troubleshooting and resolving software issues reported by users.
Providing technical assistance to users via phone, email, or in-person.
Keeping track of user's feedback and requests for new features.
Updating and maintaining documentation for software products.
Collaborating with IT team to identify and fix software bugs.
Continuously monitoring the performance of software products and making improvements as necessary.
Carry out other duties as assigned by the supervisor.
edu_req:
Educational Requirements
Bachelor degree in any discipline in or BSc in CSE, Diploma in Computer
add_req:
Additional Requirements
Age at least 25 years
Additional Qualification:
Must have professional experience on core application development using C#, ASP.NET Web form, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Core, including its Extensibility Models, MSSQL, Entity Framework, Routing, Model Binding, Web Services, REST/ JSON/ SOAP Web APIs, WCF, ADO.NET, LINQ, back-end server connectivity.
Must have experience writing complex SQL queries, Store Procedures, Functions with knowledge on Indexing, Query Optimization and Database Performance Optimization for MS SQL Server & MySQL.
Experience using SCM including Git and GitHub.
Experience with Performance Tuning and Optimization (PTO), using native monitoring and troubleshooting tools.
Experience with backups, restores and recovery models.
Strong knowledge of Development methodologies, Multithreading, OOP Design patterns and principles.
Knowledge on Software Development Architecture & Software Development Life Cycle.
Quick learner & good problem-solving skills, capable of working under tight schedule.
Work with the team to determine the best technical approach to meet business goals aligned with program architecture.
Knowledge of updated terminology, concepts, and best practices for coding on Web Application, Desktop Application and Mobile Apps.
Ability to work under pressure and work on multiple projects.
Educational qualification may be relaxed in case of highly competent candidates.
Preferred Requirements:
Experience working in SCRUM or Agile Methodologies.

The team members need to help our customers finding their security issues and help them remediate, effectively manage digital risks and enable them to achieve compliance requirements. Pen testers with bug bounty hunting and CTF competition experience will be preferred.

title: Senior Java Developer (Platform) [Remote]
job_context:
Job Context
As a senior member of the development team, you will use primarily Java technologies to design and develop enterprise level applications.
We develop applications for broadcast automation and video streaming, as well as APIs for the website and mobile applications. There is a lot of integration involved with high volume public facing APIs in the cloud, as well as fail-tolerant internal systems, therefore you need to be well versed in building extensible, robust and fine-tuned code.
This role will work across all aspects of SDLC, including design, testing, implementation, operation, and support of applications in production, which requires the ability to effectively communicate technical concerns with other technical teams such as operations, networking and external development teams.
As part of this role you need to adhere to coding standards and practices as well as mentor and coach junior members in the team. It will be an opportunity to be involved in complex projects, work autonomously and take a piece of work from design to operations. We expect you to perform lots of code reviews, write good unit tests and be keen to document your work. You should also be interested in improving and work according to best practices of CI/CD and DevOps.

Mentor, train and help junior members.

title: Frontend JavaScript Engineer (JAMSTACK)
job_context:
Job Context
Job Summary:
Our company specializes in the modern web and develops outsourced business that develops projects of various scales, from companies listed on the First Section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange to startups. We have a development style in which everything from formulating system specifications to design and implementation is performed on the go. Our company mainly develops Jamstack systems using Next.js/TypeScript. With this configuration, the rendering speed and SEO effect will be higher because the final static file can be delivered. The APIs layer mainly utilizes headless CMS such as microCMS, but may also be developed in-house if necessary. In addition to Jamstack, we also develop systems using Next.js and external APIs. It has been four years since our founding, and we have entered a phase of further business expansion. We are looking for a Jamstack engineer to support our expansion. We are still an immature company, but we welcome those who can make use of their development experience so far and play an active role!

Frontend: HTML/CSS, Next.js (React), Gatsby, Node.js
Backend: Ruby on Rails (Ruby), Laravel (PHP), MySQL
Infrastructure: AWS, Vercel, microCMS, Docker, Terraform
In-house tools: Slack, Notion, Discord
Required Skill:
Development experience using frameworks such as Next.js/Nuxt.js/Angular
Development experience in TypeScript using type functions and conditional types
Experience in component design
Development experience using state management
Git team development experience
Welcome Skill:
Experience in leading a small team
Experience in back-end development (*regardless of language)
Experience in using/designing GraphQL
Experience in development using agile development methods
Experience designing distribution using Firebase, AWS Amplify/Netlify/Vercel
Experience using headless CMS such as microCMS/Contentful
Desired Figure
If you fit the following categories, we are looking forward to your application!
You like JAMSTACK
You like to accomplish something in a team
You have a sense of responsibility
You like to challenge new technologies
You can drive the growth of the company with your technical capabilities
You enjoy manufacturing new products
It is an environment where you can improve your skills as an engineer through various projects. We look forward to your application!

Mercury IT International Limited is a USA-based software company, a sister concern of Veradigm (https://veradigm.com). As an Expert Software Engineer on the Mercury IT International Limited Systems Architecture team, you`ll work closely with Business and Technical Leaders from across the organization to rearchitect our solutions to take advantage of everything the cloud (Azure) has to offer. We`re looking for someone with experience migrating solutions from an on-prem environment to Azure (PaaS). title: Senior Manager - Services
job_context:
Job Context
Esri Bangladesh is a fast-growing company that contributes to the country`s nation building efforts through geospatial technology and expertise. We deliver value to our clients through delivery of projects and services and training of users who rely on geospatial applications and enterprise systems to get their work done and solve problems.
Our solutions are based on the ArcGIS platform, a world leading technology that helps our users perform spatial analytics, geodata management, manage enterprise workflows and data dissemination on apps, cloud-hosted and local systems.
The company is part of a group of companies in Australia, Singapore, Malaysia and Indonesia that have a strong track record. With the geospatial domain set for tremendous growth and change in the years to come, Esri Bangladesh is well positioned to be a major contributor in the ever-growing and evolving GIS landscape.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
Strategic Planning and Execution
1. Identify and execute effective services programs, externally and within the Group that leverage on the Company's technology and services team skillset to contribute and grow the company's services and overall revenue and profit.
2. Set priorities, focus resources, and establish relevant productivity metrics to measure and achieve intended outcomes and results.
3. Implement plans to improve and maintain the complementary interaction between the company's portfolio of services.
Leadership
1. Build and lead an effective Services Division, including key team leaders.
2. Provide critical support and effective empowerment to their direct reports, team leaders and team members.
3. Foster and facilitate cooperation and synergy between company departments.
4. Ensuring alignment with the company and the joint priorities of the wider Boustead Geospatial Group and Esri Inc.
Customer/Market Growth and Retention
1. Stay abreast with technological developments and position service offerings and holistic solutions to value-add to clients' businesses and success.
2. Collaborate with sales team to win customers in strategic sectors and expand market share with appropriate commercial offerings.
3. Maintain relationships with senior levels of key clients and partners.
4. Maintain customer satisfaction levels.
Operations and Processes
1. P/L accountability for the project implementation and managed services.
2. Enforce and leverage key processes (proposal process, resource utilization, service delivery and quality, etc.) to increase efficiency and client satisfaction.
3. Initiate and oversee processes improvements to raise productivity and quality of service.
4. Identify and understand business risks and effectively mitigate them.
People Management
1. Establishing a successful hiring of the right candidates with a thorough understanding of overall services needs and business priorities.
2. Mentor, coach and nurture talent and skills of the team according to market needs.
3. Design and scope responsibilities for key roles.
4. Develop a strong bench of potential successors and next-line leaders.
5. Nurture and maintain healthy levels of staff engagement.

Esri South Asia has been engaged with users in Bangladesh since 1990s, providing location intelligence technology to many sectors such as urban development, utilities, public services, water resources, agriculture, land planning and land management and many more.
Esri`s world-leading ArcGIS platform helps organizations and professionals to make better decisions for greater impact.
This is an opportunity for passionate and talented people to be part of the fast growing field of geospatial technology and location intelligence. You will be working with a pioneer and the leader in geospatial information systems (GIS) and spatial analytics that enhance the performance of any organization.
We are looking for motivated individuals with a positive attitude who can deliver solutions towards positive outcomes for our clients, to join the branch office of Esri South Asia in Bangladesh, and be part of our network of geospatial talent in the South and South-East Asia and Australian region.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
Working with ArcGIS end-users and decision makers in Bangladesh, understanding their technological needs, and documenting technical requirements.
Design best digital solutions with the team to identify and solve complex challenges faced by many of our clients.
Build system architecture knowledge and expertise in the fast growing field of enterprise geospatial technology, while delivering high availability and scalability solutions.
Gain awareness of critical insights, how critical infrastructure and city development processes are transforming through the use of location technology.
Working with a team of geospatial professionals supported by global experts.
Build a track record of being an expert in the fast-growing field of location intelligence.
To work with a highly skilled and diverse team, deploy the latest Esri technologies, incorporating 4IR trends of IoT, Big Data, and Analytics into well-architected solutions and systems for our end-users
edu_req:
Educational Requirements
Master of Science (MSc) in CSE, IT, ICT, EEE or, Masters in Computer Application (MCA) in CSE, Information Technology, ICT, Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA) in CSE, ICT/IT
Skills Required: Data Analytics, Mobile App Development, Software Development, Web Application Development
exp_req:
Experience Requirements
At least 3 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following area(s):
Data Analytics, Full Stack Development, JavaScript, Mobile Application Developer, Programming, Python
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):
IT Enabled Service, Software Company
add_req:
Additional Requirements
Age at most 40 years
Both males and females are allowed to apply
Language skill: both English and Bangla
Report writing skill in English
Mapping Application development will assets
other_bnf:
Compensation & Other Benefits
Performance bonus, Weekly 2 holidays
Festival Bonus: 2
Training and exchange working opportunity in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia and USA

সেই অনুযায়ী ব্যবসা গ্রিপ করার জন্য গ্রাহকের সাথে সঠিক আলোচনা।

সময়মতো ডেলিভারি, অনুমান, প্রকল্প সম্পর্কিত সিদ্ধান্ত এবং গ্রাহকের প্রয়োজনীয়তা অনুযায়ী প্রয়োজনীয় সার্ভিসগুলি নিশ্চিত করার জন্য অভ্যন্তরীণ দলের সদস্যদের সাথে সমন্বয়।

Responding to database related alerts and escalations and coming up with strategic solutions to recurring problems.
Support capacity development initiatives by continuous exchange of knowledge between team members, providing training and conducting session on technical issues.

title: Operations & Customer Support (Senior) Manager
job_context:
Job Context
We are a leading & well-reputed software development company working more than a decade in Credit & Savings Management application development, Accounting & Inventory Management software etc. Our clients are spreaded all over the country. There is demand of our existing software product; and potential demand of few more complementary products is also huge in the country. We are constantly upgrading our existing software application to make it more user-friendly and are also exploring to increase more products & services in our portfolio of businesses.
It is a focal position where an incumbent will work with clients, software development team, junior staffs under your supervision, peer group people and Top Management. You need to be proactive and self-motivated to get things done without having much supervision.
It is a Mid-level position within the operations division, which will require peoples` management skill (including verbal & written communication skill, leadership skill etc.), technical knowledge on how a software firm works, basic understanding of software development process, gross understanding on database management system, software languages, web development tools & tips, basic ideas on webpage development technology etc.
You will also require to monitor & evaluate existing online and social media presence of the company & its existing products and find ways to improve promotional efforts, market presence & marketing. You are expected to have skill to write contents on products & services of the company for web, Facebook & other social media pages, produce creative contents including banners, festoon, promotional videos etc.
We expect you to bring in necessary experience & skill in order to introduce and implement new approach, process, discipline within operations, customers support and development teams; which will ultimately improve existing productivity, efficiency in product development and customer support of the company. So, you are expected to be a strong leader with a focused & disciplined approach in your work.
Based on your capacity and performance, this position may lead to higher management position within the organization.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
You will be required to quickly learn day-to-day operational tools, practices & technical features of existing product & service, and implement existing tools & procedure to continue running existing operations.
You will be assigned with a portfolio of existing and potential clients to deal with their day-to-day operational issues, receive their phone calls and provide solution after having discussion with the Software team.
Take responsibility for the establishment and development of customer relationship, customer resource management.
Take responsibility for monitoring and managing key software development project by liaison with software development team, operations team and Top Management.
Be responsible for expanding and maintaining medium and long-term partnerships with local customers, ensuring the achievement of goals, exploring and cultivating new customer groups and new product opportunities.
Establish and optimize sales organization and sales team, clarify responsibilities and promote implementation.
Time to time, there are issues and bugs in the software system which need to be explored and resolved by the Software Team. In order to fix bugs you have to have clear understanding of the business logics and operational procedure of the existing software system. You will guide product team or software team about the issues and ensure the issues were resolved before making it live for the client.
Client will call your phone number when they face an issue with the software application - you need to answer to his queries modestly and get a solution (fix issue) within promised deadline by engaging the software & operations team members.
After getting a new product or feature development requirement from the client, you will be required to design the outline, process-flow, flow-chart etc. and discuss the same with the Software Development Team & Top Management to develop & implement the requirement in the application.
Upgrade, develop, introduce new tools & system to improve internal processes, administration, follow-up, performance appraisal to increase qualitative & quantitative improvement within the organization.
Make online & offline presentation to boost sales to the potential new clients. Time to time, you will provide training on various topics related to software system to the clients. You will visit clients' office, meet Top management & field level staffs to discuss issues, being faced by them and get those issues resolved by Software Team and other members of the Operations Team within limited deadline.
Explore and monitor other competitive products, services and vendors and suggest & implement ways of improvement in the existing product.
To lead and manage the team to ensure best output at all time.
Bring sustainable efficiency improvement by identifying the bottlenecks and ensuring elimination of it.
Actively explore to introduce new & innovative complementary products to increase portfolio of business.
Take lead to find loopholes in the existing product, process and actively engage with your teammates to complete the job within limited timeline.
Identify and report new and changing customer requirement on products and services.
Provide KPI progress information on a weekly basis.
edu_req:
Educational Requirements
Graduation / Masters in CSE/Business/Commerce/Marketing/ Finance/Accounting OR, combination of Science (SSC+HSC) + Commerce (Graduation + Masters') only.
add_req:
Additional Requirements
At least 07 (seven) years' of relevant work experience.
Skills required: Creative Thinking, Quick Problem Solving, Strong Analytical ability, Strong Negotiation skills.
Working Experience with a software development company and having experience of actively developing financial or accounting related software.
Ability to meet challenging deadlines and work in a fast-paced environment.
Excellent Peoples' Management skills including interpersonal, communication and convincing skill.
Sound Accounting knowledge, as we are working with accounting based software.
Working experience with Graphics Designing Tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Video Editing, Social Media Tools, YouTube video editing will be given preference.
Proficient in MS Word, Excel, Email, Power Point and social media tools.
Content writing skill especially in English & Bangla will be an added advantage.
Must be Enthusiastic, Pro-active, Punctual, Honest and Hard-working.
other_bnf:

Yearly two (02) festival bonuses.
Performance based yearly salary revision and profit sharing.
Activity based numerous operational & sales Incentives
Profit Sharing
Daily refreshment facility and lunch benefits.

Nifty Coders is a software development firm specializing in Product Engineering, Cloud Engineering, DevOps, IT Consultancy and Business Intelligence. Run business operation for Interconnect as per defined Task & SLA for customer.

Handle all types of High, Medium & Low incidents, which directly impact the customer business revenue

Business : HAVAL is all about freedom of choice — whether it’s our people or our products. Combined with our entrepreneurial spirit, it’s what’s driven our phenomenal success. With robust positions in each of our regional markets, our future looks equally bright too.

HAVAL is a specialist manufacturer of premium SUVs and is the No.1 SUV brand in China (the world’s largest automotive market) and has been for the past 15 years. With over 7 million global customers, last year HAVAL was the world’s 10th largest SUV manufacturer outselling Mercedes, BMW and Mitsubishi SUVs. Our success is due to a combination of commitment, passion and listening to our customers. We utilize the best features, safety and technologies from around the globe to produce world class SUVs.

In March 2018, Brand Finance, an international brand value evaluation authority, released the Top 100 Most Valuable Auto Brands 2018. HAVAL brand surpassed the prestigious international brands such as Ferrari and Aston Martin, rising to 16th place and becoming the most valuable Chinese auto brand.

HAVAL vehicles are well proportioned, have a strong street presence and a sense of balance and poise. Our interiors are beautifully designed, with ergonomics, visual and tactile appeal being our priorities. We use a combination of materials and textures that excite the senses and create an air of understated elegance and quality, such as French double stitching leather seats, Audi inspired gear console and an All-Terrain control system used in Ford.

Recently HAVAL Motors has appointed Phil Simmons as their new global Design Director and VP. Phil was previously the Design Director for Land Rover where he led the creation of the 2018 Range Rover and Range Rover Sport, 2017 Range Rover Velar and 2016 Range Rover Evoque, Discovery and Discovery Sport.

With a history of 23 years` trusted service in the automobile industry, Ace Autos, the Exclusive Distributor of Haval in Bangladesh, is confident to take it to a new level in the coming years! In that direction, we are looking for a resourceful, energetic, and ambitious team to achieve our Mission, Vision!

Work independently from management and ensure independent assessment of IT risk factors.

title: Software QA Engineer
job_context:
Job Context
A software QA lead is a professional who uses their analytical and coding skills to locate, troubleshoot, and repair procedural issues that lead to code flaws and application bugs. Software QA leads will use a combination of application-testing frameworks, user reports, and customized testing procedures to locate these problems and rectify them before the product is launched. They lead the charge in preparing hotfixes should software bugs slip through in the initial launch or subsequent updates. They are best supported by customer service personnel who can aggregate user feedback and other IT staff such as developers, administrators, and computer technicians.
job_res:

Collaborate with fellow software QA leads to develop test plans and new approaches for seeking out bugs and exploits in end-user-facing applications
Establish and implement rigorous reporting and automated monitoring systems
Establish creative direction for the company within brand guidelines
Manage multiple projects within design specifications and budget restrictions
Implement feedback and changes whenever possible
Any other tasks assigned by authority.

title: Quality Assurance Manager
job_context:
Job Context
foodpanda in Bangladesh is looking for Quality Assurance Manager- Service Operations to join their team immediately. In foopanda Bangladesh, Quality Assurance Manager audits interactions to measure adherence to prescribed company policies and processes. The Manager is a flag bearer for the foodpanda brand and evaluations interactions with an objective of improving overall customer experience through providing feedback on SOP, Process and agent behaviour
Auditing a team of front line agents across channels like Chat, Call & Email for transaction quality and SOP adherence for Customer service, partner service & dispatch.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
Act as a custodian of SOP across the foodpanda footprint and facilitate roll out/changes in an ever changing fast paced operations environment. Drive effective communication to educate "why" and "how" of the changes effectively
Closely work with BPO partners to design evaluation and training programs that address the critical performance behaviors of employees and monitor the metrics defined for success. Collaboration with the regional team on new changes, audits, and SOPs.
Perform periodic quality audits on audits and measure BPO audits for adherence to agreed SLA and even distribution. Need to visit BPO sites to see their performance and need to collaborate with the BPO leaders.
Track internal and external customer metrics and measure progress, perform continuous process mapping to improve SOP and process.
Strong understanding of process design mapping. Own test of design ; test of effectiveness for process changes. Design test current processes from outside-in ; gather feedback that acts as input for SOP teams.
Investigate the root cause of problems that have occurred and provide actionable insights that can be implemented as viable solutions in a bid for continuous improvement
Prepare and publish accurate data reports to gauge true performance of customer metrics and subsequently improve functions for the company
Prepares quality documentation and reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and trends
Responsible for driving metric improvement on CSAT, NPS
Meets financial objectives by estimating requirements, preparing annual budgets, and scheduling expenditures.
Review deliverables prepared by the team before passing them to multiple stakeholders.
A team player and data driven decision maker

Company Information
Water & Life Bangladesh
Business : Water & Life Bangladesh (W&L), a registered NGO, created by the French NGO Eau & Vie is active in Bangladesh in the livelihood development of Urban Slum dwellers implementing water supply, firefighting, hygiene promotion, sanitation and solid waste management activities.
W&L Bangladesh works in close association with the social business company Shobar Jonno Pani Ltd. (SJP), created by Eau & Vie in 2010, specialized in water supply in urban slums of Bangladesh, aiming at creating quality-controlled, piped and metered water supply networks which are financially viable, socially responsible and adapted to the needs of urban poor.
Thanks to the quality of services provided and the efficient billing system, the social enterprise gradually widens its field of action by becoming a multi-services actor, including the waste collection and the sanitation services. An innovative sanitation service is under development, ensuring proper access to safely managed latrines and wastewater and storm water evacuation.
Both W&L and SJP are engaged in partnerships with the local communities, authorities, water operator and other development stakeholders.

Business : As an evolving private company that has continually grown within the competitive industry in Bangladesh, Jamuna Group possesses high values, but the most crucial value of the company is its human resources. The name, Jamuna group is inseparably associated with the name of Mr. Md. Nurul Islam, an architect a pioneer ultimately an Industrial leader in the private sector. He heralded the Jamunas appearance in the arena of private industrial sector in 1974 with the mission and vision of building newly independent Bangladesh as a happy and prosperous country. Jamuna started its journey with the Jamuna Electric Manufacturing Co. Ltd in 1974 and it pioneered the manufacturing electrical accessories and fittings in Bangladesh since 1975. To maintain its competitiveness in todays globalized modern market, Jamuna introduced the best technology along with machinery and expertise in Bangladesh. Jamuna developed and expanded its enterprises of multi-dimension for diversifying its product range. In course of 34 years of operation Jamuna Group expanded into a giant dynasty of 24 large scale SBUs. From textile to real estate, Jamuna Group has diverse business interests. The Group has ventured into electrical, engineering, chemical, leather, garments and textiles- including spinning, knitting and dyeing, cosmetics, toiletries, beverages, real estate, tyre, housing, print and electronic media sectors.

title: Senior Manager - Services
job_context:
Job Context
Esri Bangladesh is a fast-growing company that contributes to the country`s nation building efforts through geospatial technology and expertise. We deliver value to our clients through delivery of projects and services and training of users who rely on geospatial applications and enterprise systems to get their work done and solve problems.
Our solutions are based on the ArcGIS platform, a world leading technology that helps our users perform spatial analytics, geodata management, manage enterprise workflows and data dissemination on apps, cloud-hosted and local systems.
The company is part of a group of companies in Australia, Singapore, Malaysia and Indonesia that have a strong track record. With the geospatial domain set for tremendous growth and change in the years to come, Esri Bangladesh is well positioned to be a major contributor in the ever-growing and evolving GIS landscape.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
Strategic Planning and Execution
1. Identify and execute effective services programs, externally and within the Group that leverage on the Company's technology and services team skillset to contribute and grow the company's services and overall revenue and profit.
2. Set priorities, focus resources, and establish relevant productivity metrics to measure and achieve intended outcomes and results.
3. Implement plans to improve and maintain the complementary interaction between the company's portfolio of services.
Leadership
1. Build and lead an effective Services Division, including key team leaders.
2. Provide critical support and effective empowerment to their direct reports, team leaders and team members.
3. Foster and facilitate cooperation and synergy between company departments.
4. Ensuring alignment with the company and the joint priorities of the wider Boustead Geospatial Group and Esri Inc.
Customer/Market Growth and Retention
1. Stay abreast with technological developments and position service offerings and holistic solutions to value-add to clients' businesses and success.
2. Collaborate with sales team to win customers in strategic sectors and expand market share with appropriate commercial offerings.
3. Maintain relationships with senior levels of key clients and partners.
4. Maintain customer satisfaction levels.
Operations and Processes
1. P/L accountability for the project implementation and managed services.
2. Enforce and leverage key processes (proposal process, resource utilization, service delivery and quality, etc.) to increase efficiency and client satisfaction.
3. Initiate and oversee processes improvements to raise productivity and quality of service.
4. Identify and understand business risks and effectively mitigate them.
People Management
1. Establishing a successful hiring of the right candidates with a thorough understanding of overall services needs and business priorities.
2. Mentor, coach and nurture talent and skills of the team according to market needs.
3. Design and scope responsibilities for key roles.
4. Develop a strong bench of potential successors and next-line leaders.
5. Nurture and maintain healthy levels of staff engagement.
edu_req:

Master of Science (MSc) in CSE, Geoinformatics or related
Skills Required: Business Analytics, IT Enabled Service, Leadership and Good Communication, Solution and Service

IT Enabled Service, Software Company

Published On
11 Jan 2023
Company Information
Abroad Inquiry
Address : Block: C, House No: 47, Road No: 6, 5th floor, Niketon, Gulshan 1. Dhaka -1212,
Web : http://abroadinquiry.com
Business : Abroad Inquiry was born in 2017 from an altruist Facebook group that has helped hundreds of international students pursue higher study abroad worldwide. Abroad Inquiry`s a community-based platform run by a group of international students from different countries. Why was the Abroad Inquiry born? The common thing that we noticed is that students are being provided with false information and misleading career guidelines from unauthentic sources, resulting in the refusal of their visa application and career breakthrough. This is not a refusal; we think it’s the death of a dream. At our Abroad Inquiry, we provide all accurate factual information related to higher study abroad that we have acquired from our real-life experience and thorough research. We believe that a current student who has already gone through the hectic study abroad journey can be the best source of information and understand the situation better than others. The information obtained is more authentic than online sources or any other student consultancy firms. Thus, we have built this platform to help upcoming students.

Our mentors have already graduated from top-notch universities in different countries. Moreover, some of them are working at reputed companies working relentlessly to ease the journey of potential future students. However, we decided to serve upcoming students because, as international students, we experienced the same thing before going to a new place. For instance, sufficient information, the difficulty of getting admission, preparation of necessary documents as per the requirement of the respective university, and visa consular office are essential to know from authentic sources. We have an expert team of passionate individuals who are professional to make your dream of studying abroad into a reality. Furthermore, we also provide comprehensive guidelines to manage housing, part-time jobs, study advice, Permanent Residency, etc.

In a nutshell, our company provides complete support from admission to settlement in a foreign country. In addition, students will get all the support and motivation from our mentors who run this company. Therefore, let’s get in touch with us from the very first day of your planning stage.

Business : CodersTrust was founded by global business leader Mr.Aziz Ahmad, a proud Bangladeshi-American visionary with a dream to bring applied education to the mass population at an affordable cost, empowering individuals by breaking the traditional career challenges to make local workforce meet the requirements of global skill demand, and to help them earn their own living by learning modern digital skills. Along with co-founder Danish Military Captain Ferdinand Kearwolf, they commenced its operation from Denmark in 2013 in presence of Sir Richard Branson and Morten Lund based on their ideas and beliefs to make IT skill development accessible to everyone around the world. Coderstrust set a goal to make the local workforce meet the requirements of global skill demand.

CodersTrust is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark. CT’s work has been supported by the Danish International Development Agency, the United Nations Development Programme, and a handful of venture capital funds around the world. Realizing the economic growth potential of outsourcing and in developing countries, CT started its operation in Bangladesh in 2015. Md. Ataul Goni Osmani is the honorable Country Director of CodersTrust Bangladesh Dhaka.

The company currently has offices in 4 countries (Denmark, Bangladesh, USA, and Kosovo) and it has managed projects in 11 different countries across Europe and Asia (India, Malaysia, Bhutan, Kosovo, Bangladesh, Iraq, Poland, Palestine, Honduras, Kenya, and Jordan). We are the only international skill development IT training center in Bangladesh. Currently, we are providing 11 courses in Dhaka Bangladesh from CTBD. We operate from four branches in Dhaka,

CodersTrust Banani campus, (Main Campus)
Coderstrust Dhanmondi campus
CodersTrust Mirpur campus
CodersTrust Mouchak Campus

title: Project Manager (Software Development)
job_context:
Job Context
As a Project Manager, you will be acting as a bridge between the upper management, the Client, and the people who are actually responsible for the execution of the project. You will need to make sure that the project runs smoothly and stays on schedule. You will also need to update the progress of the project regularly to the upper management.
You will be taking responsibility for a specific project or several projects within the organisation. You will be in charge of planning, budgeting, monitoring, and reporting the project with the use of various project management methodologies and tools. You will be working in a collaborative team with a supportive atmosphere. You will be able to strengthen your area of expertise to have shared success.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
Defining project objectives, scopes, roles & responsibilities.
Predict resources needed to reach objectives and manage resources in an effective and efficient manner.
Prepare a budget based on the scope of work and resource requirements and track project costs to meet budget
Preparing a detailed project plan to schedule key project milestones & activities.
Provide project updates consistently to various stakeholders about strategy, adjustments, and progress.
Utilise industry best practices, techniques, and standards throughout the entire project execution life cycle.
Managing and adjusting for project scope, schedule, and/or budget changes.
Measure project performance to identify areas for improvement.
Managing the delivery of the project according to the plan.
Perform risk management analysis to reduce project risks.
Managing the relationship and communication with the client and all stakeholders, ensuring the project is delivered to their satisfaction.
Ensure all projects are delivered on time within the stipulated scope and budget.
Ensure resource availability and allocation.
Measure project performance using appropriate Project management tools.
Report and escalate to upper management as and when needed.
Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation.
Manage the software development projects and facilitate sprint releases.
High-level understanding of computer programming languages.
edu_req:

Bachelor of Science (BSc) in CSE, Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Management Information System
Or anyone can apply with a Bachelor's in a related discipline.
Skills Required: IT Project Management, Project Implementation, Project Management, Project Manager (Software), Software Project Management

title: Senior Software Engineer
job_context:
Job Context
Do you want to be part of our world-class retail solutions team?
Fiftytwo Digital Ltd is owned by Mohammadi Group and Fiftytwo A/S of Danish Bording Group. At Fiftytwo, we deliver consulting services and innovative software solutions that increase customer loyalty and boost sales figures.
Fiftytwo has pioneered technology solutions for market-leading customers within ERP, Retail, eCommerce, Leasing and the Media - making us experts in industry-specie omnichannel and data driven solutions. Through close collaboration and structured data collection, we use our vast knowledge and expertise to help our customers create a awless experience for their customers. We are driven by data and the ambition to constantly push the boundaries to make extraordinary buying moments that move minds, increase market shares, and raise numbers on the bottom line. You can read about our solutions and our customers in more detail. We have great innovative projects, and we need more engineers to join us and build the future Retail solutions for our existing customers and new markets.
Office Location: Nikunja 1, Dhaka - 1229, Bangladesh
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
You will be part of our world-class Development Team working on multiple projects and products together.
You will mentor other inexperienced developers
You will communicate directly with our distributed teams and build great solutions based on given requirements.
You will work on polyglot systems.
You will be part of building next generation cloud native solutions.
You will continuously look for better ways to improve our products and integration with partners.
You will find a competitive environment to practice your talent and surely be challenged!
You will work on business-critical tasks that generate value instantly for our customers.
You will work on integration projects that involve several development teams, usually situated in multiple countries.
edu_req:
Educational Requirements
You have a Bachelor/Master's in CSE/Mathematics/EEE or relevant field from a reputed university.
add_req:
Additional Requirements
Who are you?
You are looking for a very dynamic career in modern software development.
You often hear "WOW! HOW DID YOU DO THAT?" about the magnificent work you do.
You can work alone just fine but when you have a team you do things much faster because you know very well how and when to take help from others.
You are very obsessed about high value of your dk/dt where k=knowledge you acquire and t=time you spend at work.
You can change your gears when faced with unknown languages, technologies both new and old!
You have stories to tell us how you automated lots of your daily tasks.
You are eager to show us your bitbucket/GitHub/other public profiles where you have done cool things!
You love to learn and share what you learn.
You are fluent in both written and spoken English; you are careful of crafting sentences to express your great ideas even if it is on complex topics.
You have great connection making ability through empathic and sensible communication.
You are innovative and always looking to change the products for the better.
You are unhappy that your current job does not allow enough freedom to express your game-changing ideas!
You are restless until you hunt down that bug!
If you have 10 questions unanswered, you do not stop, you look for the next 90 questions!
You get excited when you have a question which google does not find a link for and Stackoverflow.com does not have an answer for.
You worked in an Agile environment.
You have more skills that are conducive to building a formidable TEAM and we are eager to learn about them from you!
You have a knack for solving problems.
3 years of experience in software development with C++.
Knowledge and experience in RESTful API development with any programming language.
You have a strong knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming, SOLID principles, Designer Patterns etc.
Ability to write clean code.
Familiarity with Agile methodologies for software development.
Any of the below are helpful but not compulsory:
You have worked with European customers and colleagues before.
Experience with Cloud infrastructure (Azure/ AWS).
Any PostgreSQL, SQLite, MongoDB experience.
Proficiency in JavaScript / TypeScript, HTML, CSS.
Frontend development experience, preferably Angular.
Comfortable with Linux environments.

title: Product Manager
job_context:
Job Context
We are looking for Software Product Manager . As a software product manager, you will play a crucial role in the development and success of our software products. You will be responsible for defining and prioritizing product features and requirements, gathering and analyzing customer feedback, and developing and maintaining a product roadmap. You will also work closely with the development team to ensure that the product is delivered on time and meets quality standards, and collaborate with the marketing team to develop a go-to-market strategy. Additionally, you will be responsible for analyzing market trends and competitive products to inform product development and positioning, and managing the product budget and resources. In short, your primary goal will be to ensure that our software products meet the needs of the target market and are delivered on time and within budget.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
Define the product vision and strategy, and develop a roadmap to guide the development process
Work closely with the development team to identify and prioritize features and requirements, using customer feedback and market research to inform decision making
Collaborate with cross-functional teams such as marketing, sales, and customer support to ensure that the product meets the needs of the target market and aligns with the overall business goals
Lead the development team in their use of agile methodologies such as scrum, managing the product backlog and participating in sprints to ensure that the product is delivered on time and meets quality standards
Monitor and evaluate the progress of the product at each stage of the development process, adjusting and improving as needed to ensure that the product is successful in the market
Conduct market and competitive research to stay up to date on industry trends and identify opportunities for growth and improvement.
Communicate the product vision and strategy to a wide range of stakeholders, including customers, partners, and executives, and build relationships with key industry players to drive product success.
edu_req:
Educational Requirements
Bachelor degree in any discipline
Bachelor/ Master Degree from any recognized Institute.
Training/Trade Course: Scrum Master,product management,Digital product Management
exp_req:
Experience Requirements
At least 2 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following area(s):
IT Product Management, Manage Project, Technical Lead (Software)
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):
Advertising Ageny, IT Enabled Service, Software Company
add_req:
Additional Requirements
Age 24 to 35 years
Both males and females are allowed to apply
A bachelor's or master's degree in a related field such as computer science, engineering, or business.
At least 2 years of experience in product management or a related field, with a proven track record of delivering successful software products.
Strong strategic and creative thinking skills, with the ability to define and execute on a product vision and roadmap.
Experience using agile methodologies and managing a product backlog.
Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams to achieve common goals.
Experience defining minimum marketable features and minimum viable products, and a demonstrated ability to make data-driven decisions.
Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to multitask and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality products.
Experience with user-centered design principles and a deep understanding of the product development process.

Negotiable

title: Project Manager
job_context:
Job Context
We are looking for Project Manager who should have domain knowledge on Textile and RMG industry ERP Software Development Project.
As a Project Manager, you will be acting as a bridge between the upper management, the Client, and the people who are actually responsible for the execution of the project. You will need to make sure that the project runs smoothly and stays on schedule. You will also need to update the progress of the project regularly to the upper management.
You will be taking responsibility for a specific project or several projects within the organization. You will be in charge of planning, budgeting, monitoring, and reporting the project with the use of various project management methodologies and tools. You will be working in a collaborative team with a supportive atmosphere. You will be able to strengthen your area of expertise to have shared success.
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
Minimum 3 year(s) proven experience of managing Textile and RMG industry ERP Software Development Project.
Identify problems and their solutions
Define, analyze, document and verify current business processes, business rules and requirements and document customer's current and future business needs by completing the requirement specification documentation (RSD)
Improve clients' processes and procedures, where possible
Ensure the signoff of proposed processes and requirements by the clients
Ensure the proposed solution and requirements are understandable by stakeholders.
Carry out demonstration of prototypes or developed solutions
Translates conceptual customer requirements into functional requirements in a clear manner that is comprehensible to developers/project team.
Organize user acceptance testing
Conduct gap analysis of customers' requirements and our team
Once confirmed, document all of the customers' requirements using our Project Management tools.
Understand the user Interface requirements and evaluate, test and recommend enhancements
Conduct testing against use cases
Finalize necessary business documents required by Quality Assurance prior to Software Release
Responsible for preparing user-training manuals and conducting training sessions with end-users.

title: Digital Marketing Intern (SEO, Affiliate Marketing)
job_context:
Job Context
জবঃ ডিজিটাল মার্কেটিং ইন্টার্ন (এসইও, এফিলিয়েট মার্কেটিং)
NB: বিশেষ করে যারা খুলনা থাকেন এবং অফিসে এসে কাজ শিখতে ও কাজ করতে পারবেন তাদের কে বেশি অগ্রাধাকির দেওয়া হবে এবং পরবর্তীতে জবের সুযোগ রয়েছে। ২ জনের আগ্রহ পর্যালোচনা করে ভার্চুয়ালি কাজ করার সুযোগ রয়েছে.
আবেদনের পূর্বে লিঙ্কটি থেকে অবশ্যই ইন্টার্নশীপের ব্যাপারে সব কিছু পড়ে নিবেনঃ https://team.hostthewebsite.com/internship-program/
ইন্টার্নশিপে বেতন প্রদান করা হবে না এবং আপনাদের জন্যও পেইড কোর্স্ টি পুরোপুরি ফ্রি।
তবে যারা অফিসে এসে ইন্টার্নশিপ করবেন তাদের যাতায়াত খরচ দেওয়া হবে।
আবেদনের পূর্বে বেতনে অবশ্যই ০ (শুন্য) উল্লেখ করবেন, অন্যথায় ইন্টার্ভিয়ের জন্য আপনাকে ডাকা হবে না।
অফিসের সময় সকাল ১০ টা থেকে দুপুর ৫ টা।
অফিসের সময় আমরা আপনাকে ট্রেনিং দিব, এবং আপনাদের প্র্যাক্টিকাল অফিসের কাজ করতে হবে।
যারা ডিজটাল মার্কেটিং,ওয়েব ডেভলপমেন্ট, এফিলিয়েট মার্কেটিং এর উপর ক্যারিয়ার গড়তে চান তাদের জন্য এই ইন্টার্নশিপ সহায়ক হবে। অন্যথায় আবেদন করবেন না।
job_res:
Job Responsibilities
নীচের বিষয়গুলি নিয়ে আপনার যদি পূর্বের অভিজ্ঞতা থাকে তবে এটি আপনার জন্য একটি সুবিধা হবে। তবে তা না হলে কোনও সমস্যা নেই। নীচের বিষয়গুলি সম্পর্কে আপনাকে শুরু থেকে প্রশিক্ষন দেওয়া হবে।
এসইও: অন-পৃষ্ঠা, অফ-পৃষ্ঠা, মেটা ট্যাগস, কীওয়ার্ড এনালাইসিস, এসইও টুলস, লিঙ্ক বিল্ডিং, ওয়েবসাইট বেসিক ডিজাইন, কেস স্টাডিজ এবং লাইভ প্রোজেক্ট।
সোশ্যাল মিডিয়া মার্কেটিং: সমস্ত জনপ্রিয় সামাজিক মিডিয়া, সোশ্যাল মিডিয়া স্ট্র্যাটেজি।
ওয়েব ডেভলপমেন্ট: ওয়েবসাইট (বেসিক), হোস্টিং, ডোমেন নাম, ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস প্ল্যাটফর্ম, অ্যাক্সেস পদ্ধতি, আপনি নিজেরই তৈরি করবেন।
ব্লগিং: কেন ব্লগ ?, কমন প্ল্যাটফর্ম, ব্লগিংয়ের উদ্দেশ্য, কন্টেন্ট তৈরি, মনিটাইজিং, আপনি নিজেরই তৈরি করবেন।
অ্যানালিটিক্স: গুগল অ্যানালিটিক্স ড্যাশবোর্ড, ওয়েবসাইটের সাথে অ্যানালিটিক্স সংযুক্ত, ম্যানেজমেন্ট, ট্র্যাকিং, লক্ষ্য এবং ফানেলস, প্যারামিটারের ব্যাখ্যা, কেস স্টাডিজ
এফিলিয়েট মার্কেটিং: এফিলিয়েট মার্কেটিং কী ?, এফিলিয়েট মার্কেটিং এর প্রয়োজনীয়তা, ব্যয় বেনিফিট, সুবিধা, প্রক্রিয়া প্রবাহ।
ইমেইল মার্কেটিংঃ বেসিক, কন্টেন্ট চেকিং, গাইডলাইন, টেমপ্লেট ম্যানেজ
সুতরাং, আপনার "ফ্রেশার" স্ট্যাটাসটি "অভিজ্ঞ" হিসাবে পরিবর্তন করার জন্য আর অপেক্ষা করবেন না এবং আপনার আপডেট সিভি এবং সাম্প্রতিক ফটোগ্রাফের সাথে আমাদের সাথে যোগাযোগ করুন।
edu_req:
Educational Requirements
HSC
add_req:
Additional Requirements
Age 18 to 29 years
Only males are allowed to apply
ডিজিটাল বিপণন / অনুমোদিত বিপণন / বেসিক ওয়েব ডিজাইন শেখার পূর্ববর্তী অভিজ্ঞতা। ইংরেজি বুঝতে দক্ষ. একটি পারসোনাল ল্যাপটপ আছে। ইন্টার্ন হিসাবে 3 মাস চালিয়ে যেতে ইচ্ছুক.

title: Social Media Specialist
job_context:
Job Context
Our work at Helping Ants supports the world`s growing technology companies. We are currently on the hunt for smart and ambitious individuals who will be part of the project execution team for our exciting and dynamic clients. Our company is young, and agile, and we are looking for colleagues who want to grow alongside our company, and our clients.
We are seeking a highly skilled, motivated, and knowledgeable Social Media Specialist. Social media specialists should have a solid understanding of how each social media channel works and how to optimize content so that it is engaging on those channels. You are responsible for joining relevant conversations on behalf of the brand and "soft selling" the product by providing support to current and prospective customers.
Working Hours: 9 AM to 6 PM

Collaborating with colleagues on social media implementation best practices and strategies
Collects customer data and analyses interactions and visits, plus uses this information to create comprehensive reports and improve future marketing strategies and campaigns
Reports progress to senior marketing management
Grows and expands company social media presence into new social media platforms, plus increases presence on existing platforms including Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Instagram

title: Full Stack Developer (Bangladesh National)
job_context:
Job Context
The Regional Integrated Multi-Hazard Early Warning System for Africa and Asia (RIMES) is an International and Intergovernmental organization that supports national hydro-met service providers and local level institutions in research and development of forecasting and warning services. RIMES has in total 48 member states and collaborating countries (for further details, please visit www.rimes.int). RIMES was established on 30 April 2009 through the signing by collaborating countries of the RIMES regional cooperation agreement. Web : www.cegisbd.com
Business : Center for Environmental and Geographic Information Services (CEGIS) is a public trust and a multi-disciplined organization under the Ministry of Water Resources, which was established in May 2002. It is a scientifically independent organization and provides integrated environmental services using state-of-the-art technologies like Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), Information Technology (IT), modelling and so on. It provides solution to issues and problems in a wide ranges of sectors such as water, land, agriculture, metrology, forestry, fisheries, morphology, socio-economy, power, transportation and disasters. CEGIS works both independently and in close collaboration with the government and non-government organizations (NGOs) of the country as well as regional and international agencies. Geographic Information System (GIS) technology is one of the pioneering strength of CEGIS, which it has been innovatively applying to various projects. Customized software applications, tools, web GIS etc. are intensively used and developed by in-house professionals accordingly.
